Community Services

Solidwork Lessons

One of the community services we provide is teaching freshmen the 3D CAD software Solidworks, which was started by our previous chapter President.

C# Lessons

We give lectures on the programming language C# to beginners. Our goal is to prepare the new members of our team for the National Conference.

Voluntary Language Tutoring

Members of our team volunteer to tutor underclassmen who are struggling with English and German, as part of a school project.

Preparation for the National Science Olympiad

Members of our chapter help prepare underclassmen for the yearly science olympiad exams in biology and programming.

Voluntary Work at Sporting Events

Members of our team have volunteered to assist runners in the 38th and 39th Eurasian Marathons as well as helping swimmers at the 2018 Samsung Cross-continental Swimming Race preliminaries.
